sentence.text: Individual 11 is an 11-year-old male with mild hypertelorism, gross motor delay, and spastic dystonia of the legs requiring tendon surgery.
Otherwise, he had no intellectual problems and attends normal school.
He had a normal brain MRI and normal EEG.

Trio exome sequencing was performed as part of a research project identifying genes responsible for movement-disorder phenotypes (Helmholtz Center Munich and Technical University of Munich, Munich, Germany), and identified a de novo missense variant in POLR1A c.3721G>A; p.
